name: Mayday!
description:
Heyo! First game made for my first game jam! Not the greatest in the world but happy I got it done. (Made for the 2021 February Brackey's game jam)

Mayday!

This is a first person puzzle game where you and a fellow ufo have been captured! Find your way to the escape using pushable blocks and each other.  Pressing 'e' will allow you to take control of the other character, use this to solve puzzles.  glhf!

*Additional Notes

- Yeah its a buggy mess what about it?

- I have a relatively high end computer so I'm sorry if this doesn't preform very well on some devices.

 - Didn't have time for audio your headphones are working fine :)

- I know there might be some softlocks so don't forget you can press backspace to reset the level.
